title: "Klarna makes its latest acquisition with Swedish fintech PriceRunner"
excerpt: "With a pot of cash as big as Klarna’s, it’s no wonder that the buy now, pay later fintech is making a number of acquisitions—making four this year alone. Today, the BNPL firm has announced it has acquired Nordic comparison shopping service PriceRunner for an undisclosed amount."
